text_block_list.text: As part of training, mock races are held on campus. Today, it seems like Silence Suzuka will be participating.
While I was a little concerned about what happened in the library the other day, I came to spectate…

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Suzuka, you understand what the goal of today's mock race is, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um… applying what I learned in preparation for my debut race.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: That's right. Your debut race next month is approaching.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Which is exactly why you should go out there and make this new "Planned Speed Control" running style yours!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Yes.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I've been looking forward to this day, Suzuka. I'll have you show me how much you've grown under that trainer.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I won't let you take the lead.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fuu, I'll return those words right back at you. Well then, I'll be heading off first.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Just like I was taught, hold back at first, saving my power until the end

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah… it'll be alright. It's the correct method after all… I'll definitely win.
And thus, Silence Suzuka's mock race began. However…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… haaa…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No… not yet, I still need to hold back…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Suzuka…?
Even though in the Selection Race she took such a huge lead, it looks like today she's not taking the lead from the start.
Perhaps, her trainer's instructions were to use "Planned Speed Control". But…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Uu… kuu…
She was surrounded by the other girls, it seemed like she was being constrained… and looked distressed.
And then, towards the end of the race-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The last straight…! Now…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: H-huh? My legs…I can't put in any power…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …I'll end this!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah…!
Air Groove and the other girls entered the final spurt. Silence Suzuka was buried in that group and they passed her one after another…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I can't see the front…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I can't see… that scenery…

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: 8th… An unfortunate result, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: You held back in the beginning like instructed, so I think it's a good result. But, at the end your running wasn't as sharp. What happened?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Suzuka?…is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… I-I'm sorry. Um…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …I'm sorry, I don't know. I don't… really understand it myself…

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: …I see. It looks like it'll take a bit longer to make that new running style your own.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Then, let's cancel your debut race for now. After all, there's no need to rush right now.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh…?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Cancel my debut… a-are you telling me not to run?!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Please, calm down. I'm just saying we should wait. Once you get more used to the new running style we can enter-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Please wait, I can run! No, I want to run…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Running in the lead is my-

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: But, you're not used to running like this. You understand that, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …uu.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Suzuka, please listen. I just want you to be in perfect condition for your debut race.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Take your time to learn the new running style… it won't be too late after that, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: When is 'after that'…?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Eh? Sorry, did you say something…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …sorry, nothing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm… heading home for today.
Leaving the course with shoulders sagging, Silence Suzuka's back was like a lost child's. It was painful to look…
